parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> RTD

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Toggles stress damage in [[Description.ext#forceRotorLibSimulation | Advanced Flight Model]], which otherwise could be manually toggles in game setting: <tt>Options</tt> - <tt>Game</tt> - <tt>Helicopter Flight Model</tt> - <tt>Advanced</tt> - <tt>Stress Damage</tt>.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>afm</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''enableStressDamage''' state

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to enable stress damage, [[false]] to disable it

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[difficultyEnabledRTD]]) [[then]] { [[enableStressDamage]] [[true]] };</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[Description.ext#forceRotorLibSimulation | forceRotorLibSimulation]], [[difficultyEnabledRTD]], [[isStressDamageEnabled]]
</value></part></template>
